1.title: Non Root Cause Processing
1.description: A systematic approach focused on identifying and addressing the underlying factors of an issue, rather than just treating symptoms. This ensures long-term and effective solutions.

2.title: Stage of Liberation
2.description: The phase where limitations or constraints are removed, enabling growth, freedom, and transformation towards a more optimal state of being or operation.

3.title: Repeated, Consistent Result
3.description: Ensuring that processes or treatments yield reliable outcomes over time, confirming their validity and dependability through consistent repetition.

4.title: Totally Measured and Calibrated Process
4.description: A precisely controlled method where every step is accurately quantified and adjusted, guaranteeing maximum accuracy and efficiency.

5.title: Violently Test & Recheck
5.description: A rigorous and intensive testing procedure designed to challenge and verify the robustness and reliability of a system or process under extreme conditions.

6.title: Heal the Amygdala Automatic Response
6.description: Techniques aimed at calming and retraining the amygdala to reduce automatic fear or stress reactions, promoting emotional balance and mental well-being.

storyOfCra.backgroundContent: Allow me to share my life background. I am the eldest of three siblings, having emotional struggles in the past related to my family and trauma from the 1998 riots. I desperately wanted to feel happiness and peace within myself. I used to frequently explode in anger and had extreme fears. During major protests in Indonesia, I always fled abroad, restless and unable to sleep. Even when abroad, I spent nights closely monitoring events in Jakarta. I kept praying to God for help and answers while continuously seeking a solution.
storyOfCra.answerContent: Finally, God answered my prayers. Exactly 10 years later, every piece of the puzzle and question was complete, marking the beginning of Divine Oracular Assistance (D.O.A), the answer to my long prayers. Initially, I used this technique to solve my own life's problems and it worked! Now, my life is calm, happy, full of peace. Not a day passes without a sincere smile and gratitude for the blessings I receive, and my family has reunited harmoniously.

profileCoachRheo.title: Profile Coach Rheo
profileCoachRheo.intro:
My name is Caezarro, but you can call me Rheo.

I’m sure you’re curious about the hundreds of friends who have experienced the DOA TRTO technique and how it has transformed their lives, which is why you are here.
